titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress regarding high level visits by democratically elected officials of Taiwan to the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 7/22/2004--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that: (1) it is in U.S. national interests to communicate directly with democratically elected and appointed officials of Taiwan, including the president of Taiwan; and (2) the United States should lift all restrictions on U.S. visits by high level officials of Taiwan.
